com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful

Class Transitions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.tokens.TokenProcessor
      • com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful.Transitions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MatchProcessor

    public class Transitions
extends TokenProcessor
    Represents the transitions that lead away from a start state to the end states.

    This class is used in conjunction with StateMachine.

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    rwoo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private List<State> endStates
      This list must contain a state for each token that can be matched by this token processor.
      private OnStreamMatcher matcher
      The matcher that has to match before a transition to another state can happen.
      private State newState
      If the transition is applied, this property contains the end state of the transition.
      private TransitionGuard transitionGuard
      This guard is asked to find out whether a transition shall be applied.

      Transitions(List<State> endStates, TransitionGuard transitionGuard)
      Constructs transitions to the given states.

    • Field Detail

      • newState

        private State newState
        If the transition is applied, this property contains the end state of the transition.

        This property is reset to null by the state machine as soon as the state machine updates its current state.

      • transitionGuard

        private TransitionGuard transitionGuard
        This guard is asked to find out whether a transition shall be applied.

      • endStates

        private List<State> endStates
        This list must contain a state for each token that can be matched by this token processor.

      • matcher

        private OnStreamMatcher matcher
        The matcher that has to match before a transition to another state can happen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transitions

        public Transitions(List<State> endStates,
           TransitionGuard transitionGuard)
        Constructs transitions to the given states.
        Parameters:
        endStates - the states that can be reached by these transitions. Must not be null.
        transitionGuard - The guard that is called before a transition is executed. Must not be null.

    • Method Detail

      • mapToTokens

        private static List<Token> mapToTokens(List<State> states)
        (Functional style. Waiting for Java 8.)
        Parameters:
        states -
        Returns:
        Returns the tokens that belong to the states.

      • findStateByToken

        private static State findStateByToken(List<State> states,
                     Token token)
        (Functional style. Waiting for Java 8.)
        Parameters:
        states -
        Returns:
        Returns the state that belongs to the given token.

      • getMatcher

        public OnStreamMatcher getMatcher()
        Returns:
        Returns the matcher that must be used to find the next state.

      • processToken

        protected MatchProcessorResult processToken(Token token,
                                StringBuilder characterBuffer,
                                int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer,
                                MatchResult matchResult)
        Description copied from class: TokenProcessor
        Processes the matched token using Token.getMatchProcessor(). The token can be found in the match result at the given group offset.
        Overrides:
        processToken in class TokenProcessor

      • pollNewState

        public State pollNewState()
        Returns:
        If the transition was successful (in terms of stream modification), this methods returns the state the state machine should switch to. If the method is called, the state is reset to null.
